hello.intro: Spring in Ocala is a time when the city brings ballanced weather and steady life to the competition grounds at the World Equestrian Center. The arenas are busy, with riders and spectators filling hotels and cafes near the venue. The air is mild, the light borders are brighter, and the overall mood is asprang and ready.
